DOC.brief_summary: The FORMAT Clinical Study clinical trial evaluate safety effectiveness Formula™ 535 Iliac Balloon-Expandable Stent treatment symptomatic vascular disease iliac artery .
DOC.criteria: Up two documented common external iliac artery lesion ( one side ) , > 50 % diameter stenosis , suitable stenting iliac artery reference vessel diameter 510 mm Rutherford Category 1 , 2 , 3 , 4 . Less 18 year age lesion site < 10 > 100 mm length external iliac artery lesion visually estimate 100 % occlude presence infrarenal aortic aneurysm > 4 cm ( treat untreated ) presence aneurysm ( treat untreated ) within target vessel significant stenosis ( > 50 % ) occlusion inflow tract ( infrarenal aortic lesion ) successfully treat procedure ( success measure < 30 % residual stenosis ) absence least one patent runoff vessel ≤ 50 % stenosis throughout course ( i.e. , confirmed inline patency level foot ) angiographically evident thrombus within target vessel ( treat untreated ) lesion iliac artery previously stented
